short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind your co-workers that not every meeting is necessary!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free up your calendar with the Meetings Kill Creativity extension from MOO. We get it, meetings can be a drag. So we created an extension to do something about it. Share this with those co-workers who schedule meetings a little too much so they have to think twice before sending back-to-back invites.

The scheduler is prompted with a pop-up before sending an invite that poses questions including, “Are you sure this meeting is necessary?” Because we all know there are better ways to go about our workday. 

+Compatible with Google Chrome and Google Calendar.
+Prompts you before scheduling an event. Makes you ask yourself “Is this necessary?”
+Gives a different illustrated reason every time. Occasionally thought-provoking.
